TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientMessageInspector

summary.span: 定義訊息偵測器物件，您可以將這個物件加入至 集合以檢視或修改訊息。

span.span: Defines a message inspector object that can be added to the collection to view or modify messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 介面，並將它加入至 集合，以便在訊息通過 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端物件時檢查或修改它們。Implement the interface and add it to the collection to inspect or modify messages as they pass through a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範會在被呼叫時將字串寫入主控台的實作。The following code example shows an implementation that writes strings to the console when the implementation is called. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 將用戶端訊息偵測器插入到用戶端端點。The following code example shows how to use an to insert the client message inspector in the client endpoint. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 最後，下列程式碼範例將示範如何將用戶端組態檔修改成配合特定端點來使用端點行為。Finally, the following code example shows how to modify the client configuration file to use the endpoint behavior with a particular endpoint. [!code-xml[Interceptors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/client.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AfterReceiveReply (ref System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message reply, object correlationState);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AfterReceiveReply(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message& reply, object correlationState) cil managed
Public Sub AfterReceiveReply (ByRef reply As Message, correlationState As Object)

param.name: reply
param.span: 要轉換成各種型別並交還給用戶端應用程式的訊息。

span.span: The message to be transformed into types and handed back to the client application.

summary.span: 啟用在收到回覆訊息之後但在將它傳遞回用戶端應用程式之前的訊息檢查或修改。

span.span: Enables inspection or modification of a message after a reply message is received but prior to passing it back to the client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 ，以便在 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端物件收到訊息之後，但在將該訊息還原序列化成傳回該用戶端應用程式的物件之前，檢查或修改該回覆訊息。Implement to inspect or modify a reply message after it has been received by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client object but before it is deserialized into objects that are returned to the client application. `correlationState` 是使用者針對這個訊息呼叫 時所傳回的物件。The `correlationState` is the object returned by the user when is called for this message. 最好是為這個物件建立 ，以確保不會出現兩個相同的 `correlationState` 物件。The best practice is to make this a to ensure that no two `correlationState` objects are the same. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範會在被呼叫時將字串寫入主控台的實作。The following code example shows an implementation that writes strings to the console when the implementation is called. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 將用戶端訊息偵測器插入到用戶端端點。The following code example shows how to use an to insert the client message inspector in the client endpoint. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 最後，下列程式碼範例將示範如何將用戶端組態檔修改成配合特定端點來使用端點行為。Finally, the following code example shows how to modify the client configuration file to use the endpoint behavior with a particular endpoint. [!code-xml[Interceptors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/client.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object BeforeSendRequest (ref System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel channel);

Public Function BeforeSendRequest (ByRef request As Message, channel As IClientChannel) As Object

span.span: The message to be sent to the service.

summary.span: 啟用在向服務傳送要求訊息之前的訊息檢查或修改。

span.span: Enables inspection or modification of a message before a request message is sent to a service.

returns.span: 當作 方法之 引數傳回的物件。

span.span: The object that is returned as the argument of the method.

returns.span: 如果未使用任何相互關聯狀態，這會是 。

span.span: This is if no correlation state is used.

returns.span: 最好是為這個物件建立 ，以確保不會出現兩個相同的 物件。

span.span: The best practice is to make this a to ensure that no two objects are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 ，以便在傳送要求訊息之前檢查或修改它。Implement the to inspect or modify a request message before it is sent. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範會在被呼叫時將字串寫入主控台的實作。The following code example shows an implementation that writes strings to the console when the implementation is called. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 將用戶端訊息偵測器插入到用戶端端點。The following code example shows how to use an to insert the client message inspector in the client endpoint. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 最後，下列程式碼範例將示範如何將用戶端組態檔修改成配合特定端點來使用端點行為。Finally, the following code example shows how to modify the client configuration file to use the endpoint behavior with a particular endpoint.
